title: Integrated Health Monitoring for Medication and Emergency Alerts
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me when to take my medication and alert me in case of emergencies so that I can manage my health effectively and feel safe living independently.

title: Personalized Medication Reminders
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medications at the right times so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Medication Reminders
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive voice reminders for my medication schedule so that I can manage my health efficiently without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Emergency Assistance Alerts
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive immediate alerts during emergencies so that I can feel safe and secure living alone.

title: Simple Health Dashboard for Medication and Wellness Management
summary: As an older adult, I want a simple health dashboard that reminds me to take my medication and tracks my wellness, so that I can manage my health effectively and maintain my independence.

title: Medication Management Assistance
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me of my medication schedule so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Personalized Health Management Plans Based on My Feedback
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to create personalized health management plans based on my feedback so that I can manage my health more effectively and feel supported in my daily routines.

title: Health Check Reminders for Daily Routine
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medications and monitor my health so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health monitoring devices so that I can receive personalized care updates and medication reminders, helping me manage my health effectively.
